snippet.title: Veritas -  Coming Soon - 2019
snippet.description:
Coming early 2019. Wishlist on Steam now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/900290/Veritas

Veritas is a narrative exploration game from Glitch Games, creators of the Forever Lost trilogy, that poses the question; what is truth, and does it even matter?

Discover the truth. Uncover the lies. Free your mind.
